{{ _('Tabletop Simulator') }}

{% trans trimmed tabletop_simulator=external( "https://store.steampowered.com/app/286160/Tabletop_Simulator/", "Tabletop Simulator" ) %} {{ tabletop_simulator }} is a Steam app to play tabletop games. It has fan-made plugins to play V:tES online with friends. It is mostly used among friends who want to play the game between themselves, as there is no game log and no matching server to find fellow players inside the application itself. {% endtrans %}

{% trans trimmed discord_server=external("https://discord.gg/QJtDzp5", _("Discord Server"), icon="", color="#758AD4") %} Using this platform, the game is best played alongside a vocal channel. You can join the {{ discord_server }} dedicated to the plugin to find players, setup games, and use the vocal channels to play. {% endtrans %}

{% trans trimmed tabletop_simulator=external( "https://store.steampowered.com/app/286160/Tabletop_Simulator/", "Tabletop Simulator" ), this_plugin=external("https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2186155897", _("this plugin")), save_object='Save object'|safe %} Buy and install the {{ tabletop_simulator }} application using Steam. {{ _('Play') }}

{% trans trimmed objects='Objects'|safe, saved_objects='Saved Objects'|safe %} Find a group of friends then create a game and invite them. Draw a colour counter from the colors bag and change your color accordingly. Click the "load deck" button to load your deck. {% endtrans %}

{% trans trimmed %} Make sure you set the rotation on 90ยบ (topside button on the right) for easy lock and unlock, and set the gravity to the maximum value in the Options > Physics menu for faster cards and tokens displacements. Enabling the turns system in Options > Turns can also help. {% endtrans %}
